data.title: Lacey Chabert, Tyler Hynes, Andrew Walker and More Holiday Movie Faves Are Heading to Christmas Con 2024 (Exclusive)
data.meta_description: Michael Rady, Stephen Huszar and Jessy Schram are among the many stars attending the event in New Jersey Dec. 13-15
data.text:
Michael Rady, Stephen Huszar and Jessy Schram are among the many stars attending the event in New Jersey Dec. 13-15

The halls in Edison, New Jersey, are about to get a lot more decked. With stars, that is.

Lacey Chabert will be celebrating her 15th Christmas movie on Hallmark Channel by headlining Christmas Con 2024 in December, PEOPLE can exclusively reveal.

And joining her at the fifth annual event is a whole string of twinkling lights, er, holiday movie stars. PEOPLE can also confirm that the stars of the hotly anticipated movie Three Wiser Men and a Boy — Tyler Hynes, Andrew Walker and Paul Campbell — will be on-site, as well as Campbell's co-writer Kimberley Sustad.

Related: Christmas Con 2023: See Photos of All the Celebrities Who Were There to Celebrate (Exclusive)

Jen Lilley, Melissa Claire Egan, Rachel Skarsten and Chicago Med's Jessy Schram will also be taking the Christmas Con stage, as well as the following festive fellows: Travis Van Winkle, Michael Rady, David Haydn-Jones and Stephen Huszar.

More celebrities will be announced in the coming months. And, of course, Santa Claus will be there too!

Related: Want to Live in a TV Christmas Movie? A Hallmark Production Designer Shares the Secrets to Holiday Magic

This year marks the fifth anniversary of the annual holiday-centric convention, so the event will be filled with extra special giveaways and special merchandise.

If you feel it might be too early to think about the holidays, think again. Hallmark and Great American Family are already hard at work making holiday movie magic for the upcoming season.

Chabert's next Christmas movie, The Christmas Quest, costars Kristoffer Polaha and recently finished filming in Iceland. Similarly, Three Wiser Men and a Boy, the sequel to 2022's Three Wise Men and a Baby, wrapped last month.

Never miss a story — sign up for PEOPLE's free daily newsletter to stay up-to-date on the best of what PEOPLE has to offer, from celebrity news to compelling human interest stories.

Christmas Con 2024 will take place at the New Jersey Convention Center in Edison, New Jersey December 13-15. Tickets are available here.

For more People news, make sure to sign up for our newsletter!
